column3: Investigation Stage - Cases pending Investigation from previous Year
column4: Investigation Stage - Cases reported during the Year
column5: Investigation Stage - Cases withdrawn by govt. during investigation
column6: Investigation Stage - Cases not investigated or in which investigation was Refused
column7: Investigation Stage - Cases Declared false on Account of mistake of Fact or Law
column8: Investigation Stage - Cases in which chargesheets were submitted
column9: Investigation Stage - Cases in which chargesheets were not laid but final report submitted during the year
column11: Investigation Stage - Cases pending investigation at the end of the year
column12: Trial Stage - cases pending trial from previous year
column13: Trial Stage - cases sent for trial during the year
column14: Trial Stage - cases withdrawn by govt. during trial
column15: Trial Stage - Total cases for trial during the year
column16: Trial Stage - cases compounded or withdrawn
column17: Trial Stage - Cases in which trial were completed
column19: Trial Stage - Cases acquitted or Diascharged
column20: Trial Stage - Cases Pending trial at the end Year
